definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[אָחַלְתָּ]] Ge 27:36; [[אָחַלְתִּי]] Ec 2:10; [[וְאָֽלְתִּ֫י]] cons. Nu 11:17; —reserve, [[לִי בְרָכָה]] Ge 27:36; (withdraw), set apart [[מִן־הָרוּחַ]] Nu 11:17; withhold [[מֵהֶם]] Ec 2:10.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נֶאֱחַל]] Ez Eze 42:6 be withdrawn, i.e. shortened or narrowed.
